Package org.magelan.core.db

Interface Summary
DataSource This interface defines a set of basic methods to operate various data sources.
Row Represents a row of the data source.

AbstractRow  
DefaultDataSource  
DefaultDataSourceBeanInfo DefaultDataSource bean info class.
DelimitedFileDataSource Uses a text file as data source.

SQLDataSource  
TableLinkDataSource Creates a a new data source combining the data from 2 data sources.
